intro.titreIntro: Welcome to Creepy Night, the unmissable festival of fear!
intro.description: Immerse yourself in a unique and immersive experience dedicated to the fascinating world of fear and mystery. For a week, enjoy a rich and captivating program featuring exhibitions, film screenings, live concerts, and much more. Whether you're a thrill-seeker, a fan of horror cinema, or simply curious, Creepy Night promises unforgettable emotions.

prestataire.titreIntro: Join Creepy Night as a Vendor!
prestataire.description: Are you an artist, exhibitor, restaurateur, or entertainment professional? Join the Creepy Night adventure and showcase your skills to a horror and thrill-seeking audience. Enjoy unique visibility and be part of this unforgettable experience as an official festival vendor.

baltrouille.descriptionIntro: Come enjoy the scary nights of the festival!

deguisements.titre: Costumes for the night of {{ date }}
deguisements.noCostumes: No costumes available for this night.

cashless.title: CashLess
cashless.infoText: The digital payment, the only payment method at the Creepy Night Festival
cashless.balanceCheck: Check the balance of my bracelet and the history of my transactions
cashless.registerCard: Register my card to be able to recharge my bracelet in seconds
cashless.refund: Get a refund for my bracelet balance after the event

step1.title: 1. Credit your CashLess account
step1.text: Go to this page or the mobile app to credit your bracelet. Then on the day, present your ticket at the entrance to receive your preloaded bracelet.

step2.title: 2. Simplified payment
step2.text: Use your bracelet to pay for your purchases on-site (except for exceptions).

step3.title: 3. Refund
step3.text: At the end of the festival, if you have remaining credit, go to your online account to request a refund from November 2nd to 15th. No refunds will be accepted after this date.

title: Cauche'Marathon
description: Cauche'Marathon is a unique horror race held at the festival. Participants must run through scary circuits, avoiding monsters and traps, to reach the finish line. The top three runners of each race will receive cash rewards, medals, and an exclusive trophy!
circuit_description: There are two circuits available: The FrayeuRoute and The EpouvanTour.
circuit_time: Marathons on the FrayeuRoute will start at 8 PM, while those on The EpouvanTour will start at 10 PM.
select_places: Please select a valid number of tickets.
select_circuit: Please select a circuit to purchase a ticket.
not_logged_in: You need to be logged in to purchase a ticket.
prizes_description: All participants who finish the race will receive a "Cauche'Marathon Survivor" certificate!
trophy_description: Exclusive Cauche'Marathon trophy awarded to the winners
selected_ticket: You have chosen: {{ nb_place }} ticket(s) for the {{ selectedCircuitName }} circuit on {{ selectedDayName }}.

cauchemarathon.title: Cauche'Marathon
cauchemarathon.description:
The Cauche'Marathon is a unique horror race taking place in the festival. Participants must run through terrifying circuits, avoiding monsters and traps, to reach the finish line. The top three in each race will receive cash prizes, medals, and an exclusive trophy!

There are two circuits available: The FrayeuRoute and The EpouvanTour.

Marathons on the FrayeuRoute will start at 8 PM, while those on the EpouvanTour will start at 10 PM.
cauchemarathon.experience: Experience a thrilling horror race! The ticket price is €10.
cauchemarathon.chosen: You have chosen: {places} ticket(s) for the {circuit} circuit on {day}.

cauchemarathon.certificate: All participants who finish the race will receive the 'Cauche'Marathon Survivor' certificate!

festivalSlogan: Creepy Night: Fear has never been this exciting!

no_seats_available: No seats available for this movie.
welcome_secuflippe: Welcome to SécuFlippe, your guide for a terrifying yet secure CreepyNight festival!
secuflippe_description: Whether you're here to report a problem, track an incident, or simply learn how to stay safe throughout the event, this section is here to assist you.
what_want_to_do: What would you like to do?
problem_encountered: Have you encountered an issue? Our team is here to help you quickly.
already_reported_problem: Already reported an issue? Check the status of your request.
festival_safety_tips: A horror festival can be scary… but not dangerous if you follow these tips!
dont_stay_alone: Do not stay alone in dark or isolated areas.
familiarize_with_first_aid: Familiarize yourself with first aid stations and emergency exits on the map.
dont_leave_belongings: Monsters won’t steal your bags, but you never know with other festivalgoers!
report_suspicious_activity: If something seems suspicious, report it immediately via SécuFlippe.
do_not_venture_beyond: Some areas are off-limits for your own safety, do not venture beyond them.
team_description: Our security teams are made up of professionals and passionate volunteers who ensure that everyone enjoys the festival without worry. Feel free to ask for help or information if needed.
site_plan_and_first_aid: Site map and first aid stations
no_transactions: No transactions found for this user.
payment_success: Your payment has been successfully processed

carihorreur.description: Enter the Carihorreur, a nightclub like no other. Here, darkness comes alive to the rhythm of an enchanting and electrifying sound...

cauchemarathon.description: Choose your circuit and embark on a race where every step brings you closer to your worst fears...

cinepeur.description: Come shiver at Cinépeur with an exclusive selection of cult films, genre classics, and unreleased short films...

concerts.description: Every evening, live concerts will transport you into an enchanting atmosphere, blending dark music, energy, and immersive vibes...

baltrouille.description: Put on your best mask and dive into a night as terrifying as it is fun...

expositions.description: Discover disturbing and immersive works created by artists passionate about mystery and horror...
